FuncDef: The display remote-backup-profile slave command displays configuration and state information about a specified remote backup profile (RBP) on the slave main control board.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the name of an RBP.
The value is a string of 1 to 128 characters.

Examples: ipv6 pool ddd include  : pool pd (20)
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To check configuration and state information about a specified RBP on the slave main control board, run the display remote-backup-profile slave command.
Precautions
In VS mode, this command is supported only by the admin VS.
